notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.D. conducted the nano-indentation, SEM and AFM experiments, did formal analysis of related data and the Laue diffraction data, developed and simulated the CPFE formulations, and wrote the original manuscript. H.Y. conducted the SEM experiments, made the FIB lift-out sample, performed TEM and HR-EBSD measurements and edited and reviewed the manuscript. E.T. supervised development of the CPFE formulation, edited and reviewed the manuscript. F.H. performed the Laue diffraction experiments, supervised the overall project, edited and reviewed the manuscript. E.T. and F.H. both helped in funding acquisition.
